SEARCH
Package entity

Class Student

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.Student
public class Student extends User
Student entity class representing a student user in the internship management system. Students can apply for internships based on their profile and eligibility criteria.

Key capabilities and restrictions:

  • Registration is automatic by reading from student list file
  • Can apply for maximum of 3 internship opportunities at once
  • Year 1-2 students can ONLY apply for Basic-level internships
  • Year 3-4 students can apply for any level (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
  • Only 1 internship placement can be accepted
  • Accepting an internship automatically withdraws all other applications
  • Withdrawal requests require Career Center Staff approval
  • Can only view internships where visibility is toggled "on" and match their profile

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String userID, String name, String password, int yearOfStudy, Major major)
      Constructs a new Student with the specified profile information Initializes empty application list and no accepted internship Student accounts are created automatically from student list file during system initialization
      Parameters:
      userID - student ID (format: U followed by 7 digits and a letter, e.g., U2345123F)
      name - student's full name
      password - student's password for authentication (default: "password")
      yearOfStudy - current year of study (1-4, determines internship level eligibility)
      major - student's academic major (determines which internships are visible)

    • getAppliedInternships

      public List<String> getAppliedInternships()

      a new ArrayList containing the internship IDs

    • applyForInternship

      public boolean applyForInternship(String internshipID)
      Applies for an internship by adding it to the student's application list Maximum of 3 applications allowed. Prevents duplicate applications. Note: Actual eligibility checking (year vs level, major matching) should be done by the system before calling this method. Year 1-2 students can only apply for Basic-level internships, while Year 3-4 can apply for any level.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the ID of the internship to apply for
      Returns:
      true if application was successful, false if already applied or limit reached

    • acceptInternship

      public boolean acceptInternship(String internshipID)
      Accepts an internship placement and automatically withdraws all other applications Only 1 internship placement can be accepted per student (as per system requirements) Can only accept if: (1) application status is "Successful", (2) student has applied, and (3) hasn't already accepted another internship
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the ID of the internship to accept
      Returns:
      true if acceptance was successful, false otherwise

    • getAcceptedInternshipID

      public String getAcceptedInternshipID()
      Gets the ID of the internship that the student has accepted
      Returns:
      the accepted internship ID, or null if no internship has been accepted

    • hasAcceptedInternship

      public boolean hasAcceptedInternship()
      Checks if the student has accepted an internship placement
      Returns:
      true if the student has accepted an internship, false otherwise

    • withdrawFromInternship

      public boolean withdrawFromInternship(String internshipID)
      Requests withdrawal from an internship application If withdrawing from an accepted internship, clears the accepted status Note: All withdrawal requests (before or after placement confirmation) are subject to approval from Career Center Staff as per system requirements
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the ID of the internship to withdraw from
      Returns:
      true if the internship was found and removed, false otherwise

    • canApplyForMore

      public boolean canApplyForMore()
      Checks if the student can apply for more internships Students can apply if they have less than 3 applications and haven't accepted an internship Once an internship is accepted, all other applications are withdrawn and no new applications allowed
      Returns:
      true if the student can submit more applications, false otherwise
